original_title: National Chamber to host B2B meetings with 16 member delegation from India
original_body_lines: The National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka in association with the Global Fortune (GF Mission India) India, will conduct a B2B session for the Sri Lankan corporate/business community to explore trade and investment opportunities in Sri Lanka on Tuesday, 23 May 2023 at 3.00 p.m. the National Chamber Auditorium.

Business delegates are consisting of importers/exporters and potential investors from the industries of Agriculture, Food & Beverages sector such as Rice | Pulses | Spices | Dairy Products | Fresh Vegetables & Fruits | Dry Fruits |Cereals | Tea & Coffee | Sugar | Bakery Products | Processed Food | Ready to Eat | Cooking Oils | Soya Products | Sweet | Flour |Beverages | All Other Agri Commodities
Teejay ends 2022-23 with 70% revenue growth despite tough H2
